mapper.sql: sysconfig.id as id , sysconfig.optionKey as optionKey , sysconfig.optionValue as optionValue , sysconfig.valueType as valueType , sysconfig.remark as remark , sysconfig.status as status , sysconfig.system as system , sysconfig.creator as creator , sysconfig.createDate as createDate , sysconfig.updator as updator , sysconfig.updateDate as updateDate , sysconfig.tenant_id as tenantId
mapper.select:
select
from wk_sysconfig sysconfig where optionKey = #{optionKey} and `system` = #{system} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into wk_sysconfig
id,
optionKey,
optionValue,
valueType,
remark,
status,
system,
creator,
createDate,
updator,
updateDate,
tenant_id,
#{id},
#{optionKey},
#{optionValue},
#{valueType},
#{remark},
#{status},
#{system},
#{creator},
#{createDate},
#{updator},
#{updateDate},
#{tenantId},
mapper.update:
update wk_sysconfig
optionKey = #{optionKey},
optionValue = #{optionValue},
valueType = #{valueType},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
system = #{system},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
updator = #{updator},
updateDate = #{updateDate},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
